document_data.title: Silver Marches
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]], [[Jason Carl]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Silver Marches''''' is a sourcebook for the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'' campaign setting using the 3{{rd}}-edition {{dnd}} ruleset. 

{{Quote|''Haunted by malicious [[dragons]], hordes of [[orcs]], and other ferocious creatures, the relentless cold and unforgiving terrain of the Silver Marches promise undiscovered riches and unspeakable danger to those bold enough to venture there. Complete information on the towns and settlements of the burgeoning Silver Marches alliance and the many hazards that threaten it highlight this detailed survey of one of the most exciting regions in the Forgotten Realms game setting.''

*''6 new [[prestige classes]]'' 
*''Indigenous monsters''
*''Poster map of the region''}}
document_data.Contents:
* Introduction
* Chapter 1: The Lay of the Land
* Chapter 2: Exploring the Wilds
* Chapter 3: Cities of the Silver Marches
* Chapter 4: People of the Silver Marches
* Chapter 5: Politics and Power
* Chapter 6: Heroes of the North
* Chapter 7: Monsters of the Marches
* Chapter 8: Adventures in the North
document_data.Description: This sourcebook covers the [[Silver Marches]] region of [[northwest Faerûn]]. It provides details the towns and settlements of the burgeoning Silver Marches alliance, as well as the many hazards that threaten it.
